APB.caption: userid
APB.doc: The user's id of the participant that the action should update. You can the daily - create meeting token action to create a user id in conjunction with the daily - join room action when the user joins the room.
APB.name: userid

APC.caption: set audio
APC.doc: Use this action to modify a participant for audio-only calls. Only a meeting owner can modify a participant. You can create a meeting owner token with Daily - create meeting token.
APC.name: setaudio

APD.caption: Use this action to modify a participant for audio-only calls. Only a meeting owner can modify a participant. You can create a meeting owner token with Daily - create room.
APD.name: information
